languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} ниспослал мне дар — помимо жизни обыденной зрить жизнь внутреннюю. Вам не дано знать, что фрукт изгнил внутри, пока лезвие не разделит его пополам. Я же вижу гниль издалека — она клубится болотной жижей, стекая по спелому плоду. Злость и скука, печаль и радость — все, что люди хранят внутри, вырисовывается на холсте моего мира своими красками".

traits.locale_text: "Император ниспослал мне дар — помимо жизни обыденной зрить жизнь внутреннюю. Вам не дано знать, что фрукт изгнил внутри, пока лезвие не разделит его пополам. Я же вижу гниль издалека — она клубится болотной жижей, стекая по спелому плоду. Злость и скука, печаль и радость — все, что люди хранят внутри, вырисовывается на холсте моего мира своми красками".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} ниспослал мне дар — помимо жизни обыденной зрить жизнь внутреннюю. Вам не дано знать, что фрукт изгнил внутри, пока лезвие не разделит его пополам. Я же вижу гниль издалека — она клубится болотной жижей, стекая по спелому плоду. Злость и скука, печаль и радость — все, что люди хранят внутри, вырисовывается на холсте моего мира своими красками".

Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut inside themselves is revealed to me as colors on the canvas of my world."

You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. languages.text: “这是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}赐予我的祝福。我除了可以看到世俗的外表，还能看到内在的生命。常人只有切开水果，才能知道里面的果肉有没有腐烂，但我可以从很远的地方看到腐烂。它就像沼泽的烂泥一样翻滚，从明亮的果皮中渗出来。所有的愤怒、无聊、悲伤与快乐，人们隐藏在内心中的一切，在我面前都会像画布上的色彩一样，一览无余。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: “这是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}赐予我的祝福。我除了可以看到世俗的外表，还能看到内在的生命。常人只有切开水果，才能知道里面的果肉有没有腐烂，但我可以从很远的地方看到腐烂。它就像沼泽的烂泥一样翻滚，从明亮的果皮中渗出来。所有的愤怒、无聊、悲伤与快乐，人们隐藏在内心中的一切，在我面前都会像画布上的色彩一样，一览无余。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Emperor graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

languages.text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me otorgó un don. Puedo ver la vida interior además de lo mundano. Usted no puede ver que un fruto se ha podrido hasta que lo corta en trozos. Yo puedo ver la podredumbre desde lejos. Se arremolina a su alrededor como lodo de pantano, rezumando a través de la piel. La ira y el aburrimiento, la alegría y la tristeza, todo lo que la gente encierra en su interior se me aparece como colores en el lienzo de mi mundo».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me otorgó un don. Puedo ver la vida interior además de lo mundano. Usted no puede ver que un fruto se ha podrido hasta que lo corta en trozos. Yo puedo ver la podredumbre desde lejos. Se arremolina a su alrededor como lodo de pantano, rezumando a través de la piel. La ira y el aburrimiento, la alegría y la tristeza, todo lo que la gente encierra en su interior se me aparece como colores en el lienzo de mi mundo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}は私に贈り物を授けられたのです。刃物で真っ二つに切り裂かれるまで、果物が内側から腐っていることはわかりません。ですが、私は遠くからでも腐敗を見ることができます。それは沼の泥のようにうごめき、鮮やかな皮からにじみ出てくるのです。怒りも退屈も、悲しみも喜びも、人々が自分の中に閉じ込めているものすべてが、私の世界のキャンバスに描かれた色のように、私の前に姿を現すのです」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}は私に贈り物を授けられたのです。刃物で真っ二つに切り裂かれるまで、果物が内側から腐っていることはわかりません。ですが、私は遠くからでも腐敗を見ることができます。それは沼の泥のようにうごめき、鮮やかな皮からにじみ出てくるのです。怒りも退屈も、悲しみも喜びも、人々が自分の中に閉じ込めているものすべてが、私の世界のキャンバスに描かれた色のように、私の前に姿を現すのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat mich mit einer Gabe gesegnet — ich kann neben dem Banalen auch das innere Leben sehen. Man weiß nicht, ob eine Frucht von innen verfault ist, bis sie von einer Klinge zerschnitten wird. Ich sehe die Fäulnis schon von weitem — sie bewegt sich wie Sumpfschlamm, sie quillt durch die strahlende Schale. Wut und Langeweile, Trauer und Freude, alles, was die Leute in ihr Innerstes verbannen, wird mir offenbart wie Farben auf der Leinwand meiner Welt"
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat mich mit einer Gabe gesegnet — ich kann neben dem Banalen auch das innere Leben sehen. Man weiß nicht, ob eine Frucht von innen verfault ist, bis sie von einer Klinge zerschnitten wird. Ich sehe die Fäulnis schon von weitem — sie bewegt sich wie Sumpfschlamm, sie quillt durch die strahlende Schale. Wut und Langeweile, Trauer und Freude, alles, was die Leute in ihr Innerstes verbannen, wird mir offenbart wie Farben auf der Leinwand meiner Welt"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a fait un don : je vois la vie intérieure au-delà de l'enveloppe matérielle. Vous, vous ne pouvez pas savoir qu'un fruit a pourri avant de le couper en deux. Moi, en revanche, je vois la pourriture de loin : elle suinte par la peau en tourbillonnant comme la fange d'un marécage. La colère, l'ennui, la tristesse, la joie... Sur la toile qui compose mon monde, tous les sentiments refoulés m'apparaissent comme des milliers de couleurs. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a fait un don : je vois la vie intérieure au-delà de l'enveloppe matérielle. Vous, vous ne pouvez pas savoir qu'un fruit a pourri avant de le couper en deux. Moi, en revanche, je vois la pourriture de loin : elle suinte par la peau en tourbillonnant comme la fange d'un marécage. La colère, l'ennui, la tristesse, la joie... Sur la toile qui compose mon monde, tous les sentiments refoulés m'apparaissent comme des milliers de couleurs. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bana bir lütuf bahşetti. Dünyevi yaşamla birlikte iç yaşamı da görebiliyorum. Ortadan ikiye yarana kadar bir meyvenin çürüyüp çürümediğini sen bilemezsin. Bense çürümüşlüğü uzaktan fark edebilirim. Çürük, balçık misali çalkalana çalkalana meyvenin parlak kabuğundan sızar. Öfkeyle can sıkıntısı, hüzünle neşe... İnsanların dışarı yansıtmadığı her şey, dünyamı saran tuvalin üzerindeki renkler gibi karşıma çıkar."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} graced me with a gift — I can see inner life in addition to the mundane. You cannot know that a fruit has rotten from the inside until a blade slices it in two. I can see the rot from far away — it roils like swamp mud, oozing through the bright peel. Anger and boredom, sadness and joy, everything that people shut away inside themselves is revealed to me like colours on the canvas of my world."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bana bir lütuf bahşetti... Dünyevi yaşamla birlikte iç yaşamı da görebiliyorum. İkiye bölene kadar bir meyvenin çürüyüp çürümediğini sen göremezsin. Bense çürüdüğünü daha yanına yaklaşmadan görebilirim... Çürük, balçık misali çalkalana çalkalana meyvenin parlak kabuğundan sızar. Öfkeyle can sıkıntısı, hüzünle neşe... İnsanların dışarı yansıtmadığı her şey, dünyamı saran tuvalin üzerindeki renkler gibi karşıma çıkar."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
